text: 1:17 Malakai 3:1; 4:5-6; Matyu 11:14; 17:11-13; Mak 9:12Eghtɨ Elaijan itir Godɨn Duam ko gavgavir kamra Jonɨn ikɨtɨ, a Ekiamɨn faragh mangɨva, afeziabar amutɨ me ua uan boribagh ifueghɨva, akɨriba ragha God gasaraziba ua me damutɨ, me ua nɨghnɨzir aghuibar gumazamizibar amuva, egh gumazamizibav kɨmtɨma me uari akɨrɨghasɨ, egh Ekiam bagh mɨzuam ikiam.”
